attributes.name: Watch List
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Watch List card for movies and TV shows tracking in the Boxel framework. This card should help users organize their entertainment queue, track viewing progress, rate content, discover new shows and movies, and manage their viewing preferences across multiple streaming platforms.

## Core Fields

### Content Information
- **title**: StringField - Movie/show title
- **contentType**: StringField with enum: "movie", "tv-series", "documentary", "miniseries", "anime", "special"
- **year**: NumberField - Release year
- **genre**: containsMany(StringField) - Drama, comedy, action, etc.
- **director**: StringField - Director name
- **cast**: containsMany(Actor) - Main actors
- **runtime**: NumberField - Total runtime in minutes
- **language**: StringField - Primary language
- **country**: StringField - Country of origin

### List Management
- **listStatus**: StringField with enum: "want-to-watch", "watching", "completed", "dropped", "on-hold"
- **priority**: StringField with enum: "low", "medium", "high", "must-watch"
- **dateAdded**: DateField - When added to list
- **dateStarted**: DateField - When began watching
- **dateCompleted**: DateField - When finished
- **source**: StringField - How discovered (recommendation, trailer, etc.)
- **tags**: containsMany(StringField) - Personal categorization

### Viewing Progress
- **episodesWatched**: NumberField - For TV series
- **totalEpisodes**: NumberField - Total episodes available
- **currentSeason**: NumberField - Current season watching
- **totalSeasons**: NumberField - Total seasons available
- **progressPercentage**: NumberField - Overall completion (computed)
- **lastWatchedEpisode**: contains(EpisodeInfo) - Most recent episode
- **nextEpisode**: contains(EpisodeInfo) - Next to watch
- **watchTime**: NumberField - Total minutes watched

### Personal Assessment
- **personalRating**: NumberField - Your rating 1-10
- **expectedRating**: NumberField - Predicted enjoyment before watching
- **review**: MarkdownField - Personal review and thoughts
- **favoriteCharacters**: containsMany(StringField) - Liked characters
- **favoriteEpisodes**: containsMany(Episode) - Best episodes
- **rewatch**: BooleanField - Would watch again
- **recommendToFriends**: BooleanField - Would recommend

### Streaming & Availability
- **streamingServices**: containsMany(StreamingService) - Where available
- **rentPurchaseOptions**: containsMany(RentalOption) - Paid options
- **availability**: contains(AvailabilityInfo) - Current access options
- **priceAlerts**: containsMany(PriceAlert) - Deal notifications
- **leavesSoon**: DateField - When leaving streaming service
- **addedToService**: DateField - When became available

### Social Features
- **watchedWith**: containsMany(WatchingCompanion) - Viewing partners
- **recommendedBy**: linksTo(Friend) - Who suggested it
- **friendsWatching**: linksToMany(Friend) - Friends also watching
- **discussionThreads**: linksToMany(Discussion) - Online conversations
- **spoilerFree**: BooleanField - Avoid spoilers setting
- **socialRating**: NumberField - Friends' average rating

### Technical Details
- **videoQuality**: StringField - HD, 4K, HDR preferences
- **audioLanguage**: StringField - Preferred audio language
- **subtitles**: StringField - Subtitle preferences
- **watchedDevices**: containsMany(Device) - TV, tablet, phone
- **downloadedOffline**: BooleanField - Available offline
- **watchHistory**: containsMany(WatchSession) - Viewing sessions

### Discovery & Recommendations
- **similarContent**: linksToMany(Content) - Related shows/movies
- **recommendationScore**: NumberField - Algorithm-calculated fit
- **trendingRank**: NumberField - Current popularity
- **criticsScore**: NumberField - Professional reviews aggregate
- **audienceScore**: NumberField - User ratings average
- **awards**: containsMany(Award) - Emmy, Oscar nominations/wins
- **basedOn**: StringField - Book, true story, remake, etc.

## Required Component Cards

### StreamingService Card
Create a separate StreamingService card with:
- **serviceName**: StringField - Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, etc.
- **subscriptionStatus**: StringField - Active, expired, free trial
- **monthlyPrice**: NumberField - Current subscription cost
- **availableUntil**: DateField - When content leaves
- **quality**: StringField - Available video quality
- **downloadLimit**: NumberField - Offline download limit
- **simultaneousStreams**: NumberField - Concurrent viewers allowed
- **lastUpdated**: DateField - When availability checked

### WatchSession Card
- **sessionDate**: DateField - Viewing date
- **startTime**: TimeField - When started watching
- **endTime**: TimeField - When stopped watching
- **duration**: NumberField - Minutes watched (computed)
- **device**: StringField - What device used
- **location**: StringField - Where watched
- **companions**: linksToMany(Person) - Who watched with
- **interrupted**: BooleanField - Session interrupted
- **quality**: StringField - Video quality used
- **notes**: StringField - Session observations

### Episode Card
- **seasonNumber**: NumberField - Season episode belongs to
- **episodeNumber**: NumberField - Episode number in season
- **episodeTitle**: StringField - Episode name
- **airDate**: DateField - Original air date
- **runtime**: NumberField - Episode length
- **description**: MarkdownField - Episode synopsis
- **rating**: NumberField - Personal episode rating
- **watched**: BooleanField - Completed viewing
- **watchDate**: DateField - When watched
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Episode thoughts

## Computed Fields Logic

### Progress Percentage
(Episodes Watched / Total Episodes) × 100 = Series completion percentage.

### Estimated Time Remaining
(Total Episodes - Episodes Watched) × Average Episode Runtime = Time to complete.

### Binge Time
Calculate how long it would take to watch entire series at different viewing paces.

### Cost Analysis
Compare streaming subscription costs vs. rental/purchase options.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design an entertainment-focused viewing interface:

**Header Section**
- Movie poster or show artwork
- Title, year, and content type
- Overall rating (personal + critics)
- Watch status badge
- Quick action buttons (Watch Now, Add to Queue)

**Content Overview**
- **Essential Info**:
  - Genre tags
  - Runtime/episode count
  - Director and main cast
  - Synopsis/description
  - Content ratings (PG, R, TV-MA)
  
- **Viewing Progress**:
  - Progress bar for series
  - Next episode information
  - Season selection
  - Continue watching button

**Streaming Options**
- Available platforms with logos
- Subscription vs. rental pricing
- Quality options (HD, 4K)
- Offline download status
- Leaving soon warnings

**Personal Tracking**
- Personal rating interface
- Review writing area
- Favorite characters/episodes
- Rewatch indicator
- Personal tags and notes

**Social Features**
- Friends' ratings and reviews
- Discussion thread links
- Watch party coordination
- Recommendation sharing
- Spoiler-free mode toggle

**Discovery Panel**
- Similar content recommendations
- Cast filmography links
- Director's other works
- Award information
- Trending status

### Grid View (Watch List Overview)
- Poster thumbnails in grid
- Title and year overlay
- Progress indicators
- Status badges
- Quick rating stars
- Platform availability icons

### List View (Detailed)
- Sortable table format
- Multiple filtering options
- Bulk operations
- Export capabilities
- Search functionality

## Interactive Features

### Smart Queue Management
- Auto-prioritize based on leaving soon
- Mood-based recommendations
- Time-available filtering
- Binge-watch planning
- Weekend movie selection

### Progress Tracking
- Automatic episode advancement
- Cross-device sync
- Manual progress adjustment
- Season completion celebrations
- Viewing milestone tracking

### Discovery Engine
- Personalized recommendations
- Trending content alerts
- New release notifications
- Price drop alerts
- Friend activity updates

## Styling Requirements
- Entertainment-focused dark theme
- High-quality poster displays
- Streaming service branding
- Progress visualization
- Mobile binge-watching optimized
- TV remote-friendly navigation
- Accessibility for vision impaired
- Multi-language UI support

## Validation Rules
- Content titles must be valid
- Ratings within 1-10 scale
- Episode counts logical
- Progress cannot exceed total
- Dates chronologically correct
- Streaming service data current
- Price information accurate
- Spoiler settings respected

## Integration Points
- **Streaming Platforms**: Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, Amazon Prime
- **Media Databases**: TMDb, IMDb, TVDb
- **Review Aggregators**: Rotten Tomatoes, Metacritic
- **Social Networks**: Facebook, Twitter sharing
- **Calendar Apps**: Release date tracking
- **Price Tracking**: Deal alerts and notifications
- **Smart TVs**: Direct playback integration
- **Voice Assistants**: "Add to watchlist" commands
- **Messaging Apps**: Watch party coordination
- **Gaming Platforms**: Achievement-style tracking

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent content matching across platforms
- Automatic progress synchronization
- Price comparison algorithms
- Recommendation engine personalization
- Availability monitoring and alerts
- Social privacy controls
- Content rating and review aggregation
- Viewing habit analysis and insights
- Binge-watching health reminders
- Family-friendly content filtering
- Spoiler protection mechanisms
- Watch party scheduling optimization
- Content discovery based on mood/time
- Cross-platform viewing history
